source: "'Yes, yes, you're right, of course. But how is the boy getting here, Dumbledore?' She eyed his cloak suddenly, as though she thought he might be hiding Harry underneath it. "'Hagrid's bringing him.'
target: "Yes, yes, you're right, of course. But how is the boy getting here, Dumbledore?" She eyed his cloak suddenly, as though she thought he might be hiding Harry underneath it. "'Hagrid's bringing him."
